SEARCH
Package src

Class BoardPanel

java.lang.Object
src.BoardPanel
public class BoardPanel extends Object
The BoardPanel class represents a panel that displays the game board and handles rendering and updating of the squares.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BoardPanel(Board board, Currentsquers currentsquers)
    Constructs a new BoardPanel object with the specified board and current squares.

      Retrieves the square at the specified position.
      Parameters:

      y - the y-coordinate of the position
      Returns:
      the square at the specified position, or null if not found
